verses.verse: שָׁמוֹר֙ <S%H8104><s%> Observe אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> the month הָאָבִ֔יב <S%H24><s%> of Abib וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> and keep פֶּ֔סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God כִּ֞י <S%H3588><s%> in בְּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> for in the month הָֽאָבִ֗יב <S%H24><s%> of Abib הוֹצִ֨יאֲךָ֜ <S%H3318><s%> brought thee forth יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt לָֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> by night

וְזָבַ֥חְתָּ <S%H2076><s%> Thou shalt therefore sacrifice פֶּ֛סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God צֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> of the flock וּבָקָ֑ר <S%H1241><s%> and the herd בַּמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יִבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> shall choose יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לְשַׁכֵּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> to place שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹאכַ֤ל <S%H398><s%> Thou shalt eat עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> and חָמֵ֔ץ <S%H2557><s%> no leavened bread שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> with it seven יָמִ֛ים <S%H3117><s%> days תֹּֽאכַל־ <S%H398><s%> shalt thou eat עָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> with מַצּ֖וֹת <S%H4682><s%> unleavened bread לֶ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> therewith [even] the bread עֹ֑נִי <S%H6040><s%> of affliction כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> in בְחִפָּז֗וֹן <S%H2649><s%> in haste יָצָ֙אתָ֙ <S%H3318><s%> for thou camest forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תִּזְכֹּ֗ר <S%H2142><s%> that thou mayest remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> י֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the day צֵֽאתְךָ֙ <S%H3318><s%> when thou camest forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> all the days חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H2416><s%> of thy life

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יֵרָאֶ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> seen לְךָ֥ שְׂאֹ֛ר <S%H7603><s%> And there shall be no leavened bread בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גְּבֻלְךָ֖ <S%H1366><s%> with thee in all thy coast שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and none יָלִ֣ין <S%H3885><s%> remain מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַבָּשָׂ֗ר <S%H1320><s%> neither shall there [any thing] of the flesh אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּזְבַּ֥ח <S%H2076><s%> which thou sacrificedst בָּעֶ֛רֶב <S%H6153><s%> at even בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <S%H7223><s%> the first לַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> all night until the morning

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> are not תוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> Thou mayest לִזְבֹּ֣חַ <S%H2076><s%> not sacrifice אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֑סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover בְּאַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> within any שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H8179><s%> of thy gates אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָֽךְ׃

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמָּק֞וֹם <S%H4725><s%> But at the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יִבְחַ֨ר <S%H977><s%> shall choose יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְשַׁכֵּ֣ן <S%H7931><s%> to place שְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> in it תִּזְבַּ֥ח <S%H2076><s%> in there thou shalt sacrifice אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפֶּ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover בָּעָ֑רֶב <S%H6153><s%> at even כְּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> at the going down הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> of the sun מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> at the season צֵֽאתְךָ֥ <S%H3318><s%> that thou camest forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt

וּבִשַּׁלְתָּ֙ <S%H1310><s%> And thou shalt roast וְאָ֣כַלְתָּ֔ <S%H398><s%> and eat בַּמָּק֕וֹם <S%H4725><s%> [it] in the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחַ֛ר <S%H977><s%> shall choose יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בּ֑וֹ וּפָנִ֣יתָ <S%H6437><s%> and thou shalt turn בַבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וְהָלַכְתָּ֖ <S%H1980><s%> and go לְאֹהָלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H168><s%> unto thy tents

שֵׁ֥שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> Six יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> days תֹּאכַ֣ל <S%H398><s%> thou shalt eat מַצּ֑וֹת <S%H4682><s%> unleavened bread וּבַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <S%H7637><s%> and on the seventh עֲצֶ֙רֶת֙ <S%H6116><s%> [shall be] a solemn assembly לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no תַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> thou shalt do מְלָאכָֽה׃ <S%H4399><s%> no work ס

שִׁבְעָ֥ה <S%H7651><s%> Seven שָׁבֻעֹ֖ת <S%H7620><s%> weeks תִּסְפָּר־ <S%H5608><s%> shalt thou number לָ֑ךְ מֵהָחֵ֤ל <S%H2490><s%> unto thee begin חֶרְמֵשׁ֙ <S%H2770><s%> [to put] the sickle בַּקָּמָ֔ה <S%H7054><s%> to the corn תָּחֵ֣ל <S%H2490><s%> from [such time as] thou beginnest לִסְפֹּ֔ר <S%H5608><s%> to number שִׁבְעָ֖ה <S%H7651><s%> the seven שָׁבֻעֽוֹת׃ <S%H7620><s%> weeks

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <S%H6213><s%> And thou shalt keep חַ֤ג <S%H2282><s%> the feast שָׁבֻעוֹת֙ <S%H7620><s%> of weeks לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God מִסַּ֛ת <S%H4530><s%> with a tribute נִדְבַ֥ת <S%H5071><s%> of a freewill offering יָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> of thine hand אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּתֵּ֑ן <S%H5414><s%> which thou shalt give כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יְבָרֶכְךָ֖ <S%H1288><s%> hath blessed יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> [unto the LORD thy God] according as the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God

וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֞ <S%H8055><s%> And thou shalt rejoice לִפְנֵ֣י ׀ <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> you וּבִנְךָ֣ <S%H1121><s%> thou and thy son וּבִתֶּךָ֮ <S%H1323><s%> and thy daughter וְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <S%H5650><s%> and thy manservant וַאֲמָתֶךָ֒ <S%H519><s%> and thy maidservant וְהַלֵּוִי֙ <S%H3881><s%> and the Levite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H8179><s%> that [is] within thy gates וְהַגֵּ֛ר <S%H1616><s%> and the stranger וְהַיָּת֥וֹם <S%H3490><s%> and the fatherless וְהָאַלְמָנָ֖ה <S%H490><s%> and the widow אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּקִרְבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7130><s%> that [are] among בַּמָּק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> you in the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who יִבְחַר֙ <S%H977><s%> hath chosen יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְשַׁכֵּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> to place שְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

וְזָ֣כַרְתָּ֔ <S%H2142><s%> And thou shalt remember כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עֶ֥בֶד <S%H5650><s%> that thou wast a bondman הָיִ֖יתָ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> in Egypt וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <S%H8104><s%> and thou shalt observe וְעָשִׂ֔יתָ <S%H6213><s%> and do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽחֻקִּ֖ים <S%H2706><s%> these statutes הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> these פ

חַ֧ג <S%H2282><s%> the feast הַסֻּכֹּ֛ת <S%H5521><s%> of tabernacles תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> Thou shalt observe לְךָ֖ שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days בְּאָ֨סְפְּךָ֔ <S%H622><s%> after that thou hast gathered מִֽגָּרְנְךָ֖ <S%H1637><s%> in thy corn וּמִיִּקְבֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3342><s%> and thy wine

וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֖ <S%H8055><s%> And thou shalt rejoice בְּחַגֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2282><s%> in thy feast אַתָּ֨ה <S%H859><s%> you וּבִנְךָ֤ <S%H1121><s%> thou and thy son וּבִתֶּ֙ךָ֙ <S%H1323><s%> and thy daughter וְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <S%H5650><s%> and thy manservant וַאֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H519><s%> and thy maidservant וְהַלֵּוִ֗י <S%H3881><s%> and the Levite וְהַגֵּ֛ר <S%H1616><s%> the stranger וְהַיָּת֥וֹם <S%H3490><s%> and the fatherless וְהָאַלְמָנָ֖ה <S%H490><s%> and the widow אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who בִּשְׁעָרֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H8179><s%> that [are] within thy gates

שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> Seven יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> days תָּחֹג֙ <S%H2287><s%> shalt thou keep a solemn feast לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בַּמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> shall choose יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because יְבָרֶכְךָ֞ <S%H1288><s%> shall bless יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> because the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בְּכֹ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> all תְּבוּאָֽתְךָ֙ <S%H8393><s%> thee in all thine increase וּבְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <S%H4639><s%> and in all the works יָדֶ֔יךָ <S%H3027><s%> of thine hands וְהָיִ֖יתָ <S%H1961><s%> become אַ֥ךְ <S%H389><s%> you will be altogether שָׂמֵֽחַ׃ <S%H8056><s%> therefore thou shalt surely rejoice

שָׁל֣וֹשׁ <S%H7969><s%> Three פְּעָמִ֣ים ׀ <S%H6471><s%> times בַּשָּׁנָ֡ה <S%H8141><s%> in a year יֵרָאֶ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> appear כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זְכוּרְךָ֜ <S%H2138><s%> shall all thy males אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֣י ׀ <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God בַּמָּקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> in the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יִבְחָ֔ר <S%H977><s%> which he shall choose בְּחַ֧ג <S%H2282><s%> in the feast הַמַּצּ֛וֹת <S%H4682><s%> of unleavened bread וּבְחַ֥ג <S%H2282><s%> and in the feast הַשָּׁבֻע֖וֹת <S%H7620><s%> of weeks וּבְחַ֣ג <S%H2282><s%> and in the feast הַסֻּכּ֑וֹת <S%H5521><s%> of tabernacles וְלֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> shall not יֵרָאֶ֛ה <S%H7200><s%> and they shall not appear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD רֵיקָֽם׃ <S%H7387><s%> empty

אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Every man כְּמַתְּנַ֣ת <S%H4979><s%> shall give יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> is able כְּבִרְכַּ֛ת <S%H1293><s%> according to the blessing יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> which he hath given לָֽךְ׃ ס

שֹׁפְטִ֣ים <S%H8199><s%> Judges וְשֹֽׁטְרִ֗ים <S%H7860><s%> and officers תִּֽתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> shalt thou make לְךָ֙ בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <S%H8179><s%> thee in all thy gates אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לְךָ֖ לִשְׁבָטֶ֑יךָ <S%H7626><s%> thee throughout thy tribes וְשָׁפְט֥וּ <S%H8199><s%> and they shall judge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> the people מִשְׁפַּט־ <S%H4941><s%> judgment צֶֽדֶק׃ <S%H6664><s%> with just

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַטֶּ֣ה <S%H5186><s%> Thou shalt not wrest מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תַכִּ֖יר <S%H5234><s%> thou shalt not respect פָּנִ֑ים <S%H6440><s%> persons וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> neither take שֹׁ֔חַד <S%H7810><s%> a gift כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הַשֹּׁ֗חַד <S%H7810><s%> for a gift יְעַוֵּר֙ <S%H5786><s%> doth blind עֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> the eyes חֲכָמִ֔ים <S%H2450><s%> of the wise וִֽיסַלֵּ֖ף <S%H5557><s%> and pervert דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> the words צַדִּיקִֽם׃ <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous

צֶ֥דֶק <S%H6664><s%> That which is altogether צֶ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> just תִּרְדֹּ֑ף <S%H7291><s%> shalt thou follow לְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תִּֽחְיֶה֙ <S%H2421><s%> that thou mayest live וְיָרַשְׁתָּ֣ <S%H3423><s%> and inherit אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָֽךְ׃ ס
